exceptions.exn: In environment d : nat H1, H2 : mon d Unable to unify "mon (S d)" with "mon d".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d

Premises:
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
recomp : forall d : nat, d <> 0 -> mon d -> mon d
c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d)
pmon2 : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon (Init.Nat.pred d)
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
pmon1 : forall d : nat, mon d -> nat
gen_mon : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d
mon_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Set, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
mon_ind : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Prop, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
mon_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> Type, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
mon_sind : forall P : forall n : nat, mon n -> SProp, P 0 n_0 -> (forall (d n : nat) (m : mon d), P d m -> P (S d) (c_n d n m)) -> forall (n : nat) (m : mon n), P n m
recomp_ok : forall (d : nat) (h : d <> 0) (m : mon d), recomp d h m = m
proj_ok : forall (d : nat) (m : mon (S d)), c_n d (pmon1 (S d) m) (pmon2 (S d) m) = m
List.nth_default_eq : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), List.nth_default d l n = List.nth n l d
Ring_polynom.PEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.PExpr C -> R
Nat.le_ind : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : nat, A n -> (forall m : nat, n <= m -> A m -> A (S m)) -> forall m : nat, n <= m -> A m
Field_theory.PCond : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
Field_theory.FEeval : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> Field_theory.FExpr C -> R
Ring_polynom.Pphi : forall R : Type, R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> R
Ring_polynom.interp_PElist : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> Prop) -> forall C : Type, (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> list R -> list (Ring_polynom.PExpr C * Ring_polynom.PExpr C) -> Prop
Nat.rs'_rs'' : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, (forall n : nat, z <= n -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) -> A n) -> forall n : nat, (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < n -> A m) < -> (forall m : nat, z <= m -> m < S n -> A m)
Ring_polynom.Pphi_pow : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> (C -> option C) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> R
Field_theory.display_pow_linear : forall R : Type, R -> R -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> (R -> R -> R) -> forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> R) -> forall Cpow : Type, (BinNums.N -> Cpow) -> (R -> Cpow -> R) -> (C -> option C) -> list R -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> R
Ring_polynom.Pphi_pow_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi ->...-> forall (P : Ring_polynom.Pol C) (fv : list R), req (Ring_polynom.Pphi_pow rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp cO cI ceqb phi Cp_phi rpow get_sign fv P) (Ring_polynom.Pphi rO radd rmul phi fv P)
Nat.central_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall z : nat, A z -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Nat.induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n -> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Ring_polynom.ring_rw_pow_correct : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall (C : Type) (cO cI : C) (cadd cmul csub : C -> C -> C) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (phi : C -> R), ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb phi ->...-> req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l pe) (Ring_polynom.Pphi_pow rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp cO cI ceqb phi Cp_phi rpow get_sign l npe)
String.string_ind : forall P : String.string -> Prop, P String.EmptyString -> (forall (a : Ascii.ascii) (s : String.string), P s -> P (String.String a s)) -> forall s : String.string, P s
Fin.t_rec : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Set, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
Fin.t_rect : forall P : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Type, (forall n : nat, P (S n) Fin.F1) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t -> P (S n) (Fin.FS t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : Fin.t n), P n t
Nat.double_induction : forall R : nat -> nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) R -> (forall m : nat, R 0 m) -> (forall n : nat, R (S n) 0) -> (forall n m : nat, R n m -> R (S n) (S m)) -> forall n m : nat, R n m
Ring_polynom.norm_subst_ok : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> almost_ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req ->...-> req (Ring_polynom.PEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp phi Cp_phi rpow l pe) (Ring_polynom.Pphi rO radd rmul phi l (Ring_polynom.norm_subst cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb cdiv n (Ring_polynom.mk_monpol_list cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb cdiv lpe) pe))
Field_theory.Field_rw_pow_correct : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (rdiv : R -> R -> R) (rinv : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> ring_eq_ext radd rmul ropp req -> (forall p q : R, req p q -> req (rinv p) (rinv q)) ->...-> req (Field_theory.FEeval rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv rinv phi Cp_phi rpow l fe) (Field_theory.display_pow_linear rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp rdiv cO cI ceqb phi Cp_phi rpow get_sign l (Ring_polynom.norm_subst cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb cdiv n lmp (Field_theory.num nfe)) (Ring_polynom.norm_subst cO cI cadd cmul csub copp ceqb cdiv n lmp (Field_theory.denum nfe)))
IDmorph : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), RelationClasses.Equivalence req -> forall reqb : R -> R -> bool, (forall x y : R, reqb x y = true -> req x y) -> ring_morph rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp reqb (IDphi (R:=R))
Nat.le_ind_rel : forall R : relation nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) R -> (forall m : nat, R 0 m) -> (forall n m : nat, n <= m -> R n m -> R (S n) (S m)) -> forall n m : nat, n <= m -> R n m
BinNatDef.N.iter : BinNums.N -> forall A : Type, (A -> A) -> A -> A
triv_div : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> bool) -> C -> C -> C * C
VectorDef.cons : forall A : Type, A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n)
List.nth_default : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> nat -> A
List.nth : forall A : Type, nat -> list A -> A -> A
Field_theory.Fnorm : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> Field_theory.FExpr C -> Field_theory.linear C
```intros d H1 H2. exact (c_n d 1 (gen_mon d 1)).```

original: intros d H1 H2. apply (c_n d 1 (gen_mon d 1)).
